title: Poland Deposit Interest Rate
description:
Deposit Interest Rate in Poland remained unchanged at 6.25 percent in November from 6.25 percent in October of 2022. Deposit Interest Rate in Poland averaged 2.27 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 7.50 percent in December of 2001 and a record low of 0 percent in April of 2020. In Poland, the deposit facility rate determines the interest rate on deposits with the central bank. It sets the floor for fluctuations of the overnight market rate. The deposit rate and the lombard rate create the fluctuation band for the overnight rate which is symmetric to the central bankâ€™s reference rate.
. This page includes a chart with historical data for Deposit Interest Rate in Poland.
author: National Bank of Poland
